meanings.definition: The hair that grows on the chin, cheeks, and throat of a person, especially a man.
meanings.sent1: His long beards were neatly trimmed and well-groomed.
meanings.sent2: Many men enjoy growing beards to change their appearance.
meanings.sent3: The beards of the old sea captain fluttered in the wind as he told his tales.
meanings.sent4: The lush beards of the forest trees whispered secrets to the wind.
meanings.sent5: The beards of the lion made it look majestic and powerful.

meanings.sent1: She beards the bully by standing up to him in front of everyone.
meanings.sent2: The detective decided to beard the suspect with tough questions.
meanings.sent3: The little mouse beards the big cat, surprising everyone with its bravery.
meanings.sent4: The hero beards the villain in a final showdown for justice.
meanings.sent5: The knight beards the dragon in a daring quest to save the kingdom.
